rules_text:
Put a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
Put target creature card in a graveyard on top of its owner's library.
You get an emblem with “Creatures you control get +1/+1 and have deathtouch and lifelink.”
special_text:
[+1]: Put a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
[-2]: Put target creature card in a graveyard on top of its owner's library.
[-6]: You get an emblem with “Creatures you control get +1/+1 and have deathtouch and lifelink.”
